content-text.text:
Push the Limits!

XumaK offers high-quality training for all levels from authors to architects.  Whether just beginning or at an advanced level, XumaK has the expertise to take you further.

social.links: [{"url":"http://www.twitter.com/TeamXumaK"\,"text":"Follow Us On Twitter"\,"imageURL":"/etc/designs/xumak/clientlib/images/twitt.png"},{"url":"http://www.facebook.com/XumaK"\,"text":"Follow Xumak on Facebook"\,"imageURL":"/etc/designs/xumak/clientlib/images/face.png"},{"url":"http://www.linkedin.com/company/2036835?trk=pro_other_cmpy"\,"text":"Follow Xumak on LinkedIn"\,"imageURL":"/etc/designs/xumak/clientlib/images/linkedin.jpg"}]

textimage.description: This workshop focuses a variety of advanced topics characteristic of a typical CQ5 deployment such as reviewing the integration design of a "full development set-up" using external repositories for your code or reviewing situations involving multiple domains with each domain assigned to a given content tree within your CQ5 instance. Furthermore, we will cover cases for optimizing indexing and even using a third party open source indexer and integrating it with CQ. A student attending this workshop should have completed the Official AdobeÂ® CQ System Administrator Training.
textimage.heading: Advanced CQ Administration Workshop
